about_the_game:
Don your trusty mount with the mortal attire of a War Nekaroo.
Feel the thrill of danger as you ride this ruthless war machine of doom, cuteness and destruction.

- Unlocks the skin: War Nekaroo
- Support the development of Edge Of Eternity

* You will find your Nekaroo skin ingame in the "Wardrobe" section of the characters status menu
